description.name: ondoerc20
description.tagline: ONDO erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-ondo Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept ONDO erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/ondo receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/ondo wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
